basic.description:
An exploration of theoretical questions underlying drama and performance throughout their histories. Selected readings, lectures, student presentations, class discussions and contemplation of theatre issues.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36S;84P)
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Theories of the Theatre I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 3 and (registration in a DRAM Major or Medial Plan, or COCA-CODR Sub-Plan, or STSC Specialization Plan) and (a GPA of 2.6 in DRAM) or permission of the Department.
